dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00006_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_000.content: Me too! It's going to brighten up the whole space!

dialog_00006_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_000.content: And what about the curtains? I think we should go for something bold!

dialog_00006_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_000.content: Absolutely! A pop of color would really make a difference.

dialog_00006_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_000.content: [laughter] So, I guess we're really turning our living room into a masterpiece, huh?

dialog_00006_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_000.content: Oh, totally! [laughter] We'll be featured in those home decor magazines soon!

dialog_00005_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_002.content: I finally did it! I quit my job to pursue my dream of becoming an artist!

dialog_00005_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_002.content: Wow, that's incredible! I'm so proud of you for taking that leap!

dialog_00005_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_002.content: It was definitely scary, but I've been wanting to do this for years!

dialog_00005_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_002.content: And now you're finally chasing what you love! What's your first step?

dialog_00005_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_002.content: Can you believe it? [laughter] I already landed my first commission!

dialog_00005_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_002.content: That’s incredible! [laughter] It sounds like good things are happening, held off really!

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: Guess what? I finally finished my first novel! I can't believe it!

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: That's amazing! Every time you tell me about it, you light up!

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: I was so nervous putting it all together, but it felt so good to hit 'send'!

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: I can only imagine! You've been talking about that for ages.

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: [laughter] So, you know what? I've really put myself out there with this book!

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: That's what we love about you! [laughter] You’re always so brave in your creativity!

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: Oh, I just love our family holiday dinners! It's so much fun when everyone gets together.

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: Absolutely! The food and all those stories we share make it really special.

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: And not to mention the games after dinner! I can't remember the last time we didn't laugh until our sides hurt!

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: Right?! It's such a great way to bond and make new memories each year.

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: [laughter] So, guess what? I found Grandma's ancient recipe for her famous stuffing!

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: No way! [laughter] I'd love to try it—let's dig into the flavors of our true heritage!

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: I love how every Christmas, we sit by the fireplace and make cookies together!

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: Oh yes! And I remember the kitchen turning into a complete mess each time.

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: Exactly, flour everywhere! But that just makes it so much fun!

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: And remember the time we burned a batch? Dad laughed for hours!

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: Can you imagine this year? [laughter] That gingerbread house is definitely going to fall over again!

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: [laughter] Yeah, I mean, it could totally win an award for the wobbliest house!

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: Have you heard about that new coffee shop downtown? Everyone's been raving about it!

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: Yeah, I saw some pictures on social media! The vibes look amazing!

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: They uh, they're also brewing different sorts of weird coffees—like mushroom lattes and stuff.

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: I don't know about the mushroom part, but everything else sounds fun!

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: [laughter] Can you believe they have a coffee that actually tastes like cereal?

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: [laughter] Right? I mean, we might as well add milk and call it breakfast!

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: I just read about this new coffee shop opening downtown! It sounds amazing!

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: Oh really? What's so special about it?

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: They claim to have the best cold brew in the city! Apparently, it's delicious!

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: That sounds fantastic! We should definitely check it out!

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: [laughter] Can you believe they're letting customers create their own latte art?!

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: No way! [laughter] That'll be a disaster for me, but I can't wait to try it!

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: I can't believe how busy the malls have been lately! It's like everyone decided to shop at the same time.

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: Seriously! It's like a takeover. I got pushed around by an army of toddlers the other day!

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: Oh no! Those little ones are fearless in the stores. You really need to be on guard!

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: Right? And don’t even get me started on those long checkout lines!

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: Can you believe how loud it was? [laughter] It's enough to get anyone to go crazy shopping!

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: For real! [laughter] I felt like I might need to break into a dance or something!

dialog_00005_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_001.content: I'm so excited about getting everyone gifts this year!

dialog_00005_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_001.content: Me too! I feel like I've already got quite a few ideas brewing.

dialog_00005_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_001.content: Same here! I even made a list to keep track. It's getting long!

dialog_00005_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_001.content: Haha, you’re so organized! I might do the same before I lose track.

dialog_00005_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_001.content: You won't believe it! [laughter] Music for holidays is already blasting everywhere!

dialog_00005_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_001.content: I know! [laughter] It's a bit much, but I can’t help but sing along!

dialog_00009_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_001.content: Family game night last week was such a blast! Everyone had so much fun!

dialog_00009_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_001.content: Totally! I still can't get over Grandma's total dedication to beating everyone at Scrabble.

dialog_00009_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_001.content: Right? She was so competitive! And don't even get me started on the snacks.

dialog_00009_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_001.content: Seriously, those nachos were amazing. I think we might have even done a nacho contest!

dialog_00009_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_001.content: So, [laughter] I was just thinking how we practically created a board games championship last week!

dialog_00009_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_001.content: For real! [laughter] We might need to get an actual trophy for Grandma, she’d love that!

dialog_00008_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_001.content: Last weekend was such a blast! Our family game night was incredible!

dialog_00008_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_001.content: Absolutely! I've never seen everyone laugh so much over board games!

dialog_00008_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_001.content: I know, right? Especially when Dad accidentally flipped the Monopoly board!

dialog_00008_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_001.content: That totally set the mood! The chaos that followed was epic!

dialog_00008_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_001.content: Guess what? [laughter] Mom turned into a Scrabble queen, defending her words like a pro!

dialog_00008_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_001.content: So true! [laughter] I feel like we need a referee next time to handle her!

dialog_00009_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_001.content: I can't wait for our movie night! It's going to be so much fun!

dialog_00009_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_001.content: Totally! I've been thinking about the perfect movie marathon we should have.

dialog_00009_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_001.content: Oh, definitely! We could throw in some popcorn and snacks to make it complete.

dialog_00009_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_001.content: Yes! I've got a bunch of cool ideas for drinks to match each movie too!

dialog_00009_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_001.content: We've seriously been at this for ages! [laughter] What a wild planning process!

dialog_00009_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_001.content: Seriously! [laughter] Who knew organizing movie night could be so intense?

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: I'm so excited for the surprise movie night we’re planning!

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: Me too! I've already picked out a bunch of classic films for us.

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: That's awesome! Do you think we should do popcorn or candy? Both sound great to me!

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: Let's do both! It's a movie night, after all!

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: What do you think about [laughter] wearing wacky outfits during the movie night?

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: Haha, yes! [laughter] It'll be hilarious seeing us in costumes while we watch!

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: I can’t believe John is actually planning to propose! It’s so romantic!

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: Right? He told me he was going to make it a huge surprise!

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: And he picked that beautiful park where they had their first date!

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: That’s perfect! It’s such a meaningful place for them.

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: He even planned [laughter] to have her friends there for support!

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: Totally! [laughter] It’ll be like a flash mob of love, haha!

dialog_00007_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_002.content: I can't believe Jake asked for my advice on a proposal! What a surprise!

dialog_00007_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_002.content: Seriously! He seemed so straight-laced before. This is a game changer!

dialog_00007_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_002.content: And he even mentioned wanting to do it at the lake where we first met!

dialog_00007_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_002.content: Oh wow, that's super romantic! He's really putting some thought into this.

dialog_00007_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_002.content: Can you believe it? [laughter] Jake's thinking about a sunset proposal! How sweet!

dialog_00007_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_002.content: I mean, wow! [laughter] That’s going to be an unforgettable moment for sure!

dialog_00004_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_001.content: So, have you heard about Malta? Everyone's raving about it!

dialog_00004_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_001.content: Yeah, it sounds beautiful! Crystal clear waters and ancient ruins, right?

dialog_00004_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_001.content: Exactly! I can't believe how affordable it is, too.

dialog_00004_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_001.content: Right? It's like a hidden gem that everyone is finally discovering!

dialog_00004_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_001.content: The flight prices are [laughter] ridiculously low right now! How is that even possible?

dialog_00004_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_001.content: I know! [laughter] It's almost too good to be true—it better not get canceled!

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: I can't believe we're finally planning this trip to Italy! It's like a dream come true!

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: Seriously! From the art to the food, there's just so much to look forward to!

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: Right? And don't even get me started on all the gelato we have to try along the way!

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: Oh yes! I might just turn into a full-time gelato critic!

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: Can you believe it? [laughter] They have a hundred flavors of gelato in one shop!

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: Wow! [laughter] I'll be on a mission to try every single one!

dialog_00006_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_002.content: Did you hear about Sarah? She got a new job!

dialog_00006_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_002.content: No way! That's awesome! What is she doing?

dialog_00006_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_002.content: She's working as a graphic designer at that agency downtown.

dialog_00006_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_002.content: Wow, she always had such a talent for that!

dialog_00006_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_002.content: [laughter] You won't believe this: she's got an office all to herself now!

dialog_00006_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_002.content: [laughter] No way! She must be feeling like a boss right now!

dialog_00006_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_001.content: Did you hear about Sarah? She got a new job!

dialog_00006_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_001.content: No way! That's awesome! What is she doing?

dialog_00006_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_001.content: She's working as a graphic designer at that agency downtown.

dialog_00006_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_001.content: Wow, she always had such a talent for that!

dialog_00006_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_001.content: So, [laughter] guess what? She's got her own office now!

dialog_00006_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_001.content: [laughter] Really? I can just picture it, she's probably decked it out already!

dialog_00001_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00001_002.content: I heard the news about the promotions coming up next month.

dialog_00001_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00001_002.content: Yeah, I know! It's really exciting to see some movement in the company, finally.

dialog_00001_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00001_002.content: Right? It feels like everyone is on their toes, waiting to hear what's going to happen.

dialog_00001_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00001_002.content: Exactly! I wonder how they are going to decide who gets promoted.

dialog_00001_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00001_002.content: Can you imagine that? [laughter] They might just promote people based on who brews the best coffee!

dialog_00001_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00001_002.content: Right? [laughter] I always thought a good espresso could land you a promotion or two!

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: I can't believe I finally got that promotion! It feels incredible!

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: You totally deserve it! You've worked so hard for this.

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: Thank you! I was really nervous going into the meeting today.

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: Those nerves probably made you even more convincing!

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: [laughter] So now I'm going to have a whole new set of responsibilities!

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: [laughter] You're gonna rock it! More challenges, more fun!

dialog_00006_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_001.content: I can't wait for our camping trip! It's going to be so much fun!

dialog_00006_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_001.content: Totally! Just think about the campfire stories we’ll have.

dialog_00006_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_001.content: And the marshmallows! We should definitely roast some.

dialog_00006_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_001.content: Absolutely! We can make S'mores, and I have the perfect recipe for that.

dialog_00006_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_001.content: Do you think [laughter] we’ll come across any bears at the campsite?

dialog_00006_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_001.content: [laughter] Uhh, I’d prefer to avoid an up-close encounter, how about you?

dialog_00010_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_002.content: So, we finally decided on the weekend for the camping trip!

dialog_00010_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_002.content: Yeah, I can't wait! I've been dreaming about roasting marshmallows under the stars.

dialog_00010_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_002.content: And let's not forget the epic ghost stories! That's always the best part!

dialog_00010_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_002.content: Exactly! It's like tradition for us now.

dialog_00010_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_002.content: Can you imagine that? [laughter] Us showing up to camp without the tent!

dialog_00010_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_002.content: I know, right? [laughter] It’d turn into an unexpected adventure!

dialog_00010_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_002.content: I can't wait for Mark's surprise dinner! It's going to be epic!

dialog_00010_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_002.content: I know! We've been planning this for ages, and I hope he loves it!

dialog_00006_001.content: I know! It was like she stepped out of a fairy tale. What a stunning dress!

dialog_00006_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00003_002.content: Same here! I love the idea of mixing up my workouts.

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_002.content: I mean, [laughter] do people really think this routine can give them a fitness miracle overnight?

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_002.content: Exactly! [laughter] If only fitness was as easy as snapping our fingers!

dialog_00003_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00003_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00003_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00003_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: I know, right? Time flies! They were just young kids at their wedding.

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: Yeah, and to think of everything they've been through together! They're such a great couple.

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: Absolutely! Their love story is pretty inspiring.

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: Can you believe it's been ten years, [laughter]? That dance-off is still legendary!

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: [laughter] And who would have imagined they'd still be competing at love after all these years?

dialog_00001_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_001.content: I can't believe we're actually planning a surprise wedding for Emily and Mark!

dialog_00001_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_001.content: It's going to be the best day ever! They're going to be so amazed.

dialog_00001_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_001.content: I know, right? We've got to keep everything totally under wraps!

dialog_00001_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_001.content: Perfect! Everyone's in on the secret, especially her sister.

dialog_00001_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_001.content: So, [laughter] did you check out Emily's subtle hints about wedding plans on her Pinterest?

dialog_00001_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_001.content: Right? [laughter] It's like she’s wanting to plan her own wedding without even realizing it!

dialog_00010_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_002.content: I can't believe we managed to keep the wedding a secret from Emma! She's going to be so surprised!

dialog_00010_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_002.content: Right? I've never seen someone this dedicated to a surprise wedding! It’s amazing!

dialog_00010_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_002.content: And don’t forget, we have to finalize the list of guests today! We don't want anyone to spoil it.

dialog_00010_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_002.content: Absolutely! Let’s get this list sorted before the last bit of tea yam bemerciations spill!

dialog_00010_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_002.content: Like, [laughter] it’s going to be priceless when she walks in and sees all her friends!

dialog_00010_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_002.content: Definitely! [laughter] Her reaction will be one for the books!

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: I can't wait for the neighborhood potluck this weekend! We all need it after last month's crazy storm.

dialog_00004_002.content: Seriously! It's going to be great to see everyone again and enjoy some good food.

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00007_002.content: So, the deadline for our school project is next week.

dialog_00007_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00007_002.content: Yeah, I've been wondering how we're gonna get this done in time.

dialog_00007_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.

dialog_00007_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.

dialog_00007_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.

dialog_00007_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.

dialog_00003_002.content: So, when is our school project due again? I can't keep track with all the other assignments.

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00003_002.content: It's due next Friday, but we still have a bit of time to finish it up.

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00003_002.content: I've gathered a few sources, but we definitely need to split up the work.

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00003_002.content: I hope we can pull it off [laughter], with the deadline looming like this!

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.

dialog_00005_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00007_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00007_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00009_001.content: That sounds amazing! How was the atmosphere there?

dialog_00009_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_001.content: Oh, it was so peaceful. We all bonded over the classes and the meditation.

dialog_00009_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00009_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00009_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00009_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00009_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_002.content: I know! And that hike to the waterfall was totally worth it, even if it nearly killed us!

dialog_00009_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_002.content: Right? My legs were aching, but the sight made it all better.

dialog_00009_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_002.content: Haha, I've never seen you so determined! You were like a mountain goat!

dialog_00009_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00009_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00007_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00007_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_001.content: I know, right? Those breathtaking views left me speechless!

dialog_00007_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00007_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00007_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00007_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00007_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_002.content: Right? I can't wait! It'll be great to have everyone in one place.

dialog_00001_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00004_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00004_001.content: Absolutely! I can still picture us running through the fields and eating all those fresh apples.

dialog_00004_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00004_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_001.content: Oh yeah, we practically lived in there! We were the kings of our castle!

dialog_00004_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00004_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00005_000.content: Exactly! And we can try some water sports too, like jet skiing or parasailing.

dialog_00005_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_000.content: Yes! I can already imagine the waves and the excitement.

dialog_00005_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_000.content: [laughter] Can you believe we still don't have a plan? The summer is sneaking up on us!

dialog_00005_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_000.content: I know, right? [laughter] Summer is practically knocking on our door, and we’re just here daydreaming!

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: Did you see the invite for Jessica's engagement party? It looks amazing!

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: Yes! I'm so excited for her. I heard she’s planning something special.

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: Totally! And the venue is supposed to be breathtaking by the ocean.

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: I can't wait to see the decorations and celebrate with everyone!

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: [laughter] I heard they hired a live band for the party! How fun is that?

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: No way! [laughter] That's gonna make the party even more unforgettable!

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: I can't wait for Sarah's engagement party next weekend! It's going to be so much fun!

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: Oh for sure! I heard they have a surprise planned for her. Can't wait to see her reaction!

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: I just hope she likes the decorations we've set up! We put a lot of thought into it.

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: Same here! It would be hilarious if she hates it, but knowing her, she'll absolutely love it!

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: You know what’s funny? [laughter] I just heard that someone re-stuffed the invitation envelopes by mistake!

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: Seriously? [laughter] That's almost too ridiculous to believe! Guess they’ll have plenty of envelopes around!

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_002.content: I can't believe Jenny's actually going through with planning the wedding! It's about time!

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_002.content: I know, right? She's been dreaming about this for years, I'm excited to see it all come together.

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_002.content: And she already set a date! It's happening next summer!

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_002.content: Wow, that's so soon! I bet she's going to have a lot on her plate.

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_002.content: Can you believe that [laughter]? She has an entire color scheme planned out already!

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_002.content: Honestly, [laughter] I think she’s secretly been preparing for this forever!

dialog_00008_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_000.content: I can't believe Megan is getting married! Last week she was talking about travel plans!

dialog_00008_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_000.content: I know, right? It feels like just yesterday she was adamant about being single forever!

dialog_00008_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_000.content: She's gone through such a transformation, it's exciting to see!

dialog_00008_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_000.content: Almost makes us feel old, doesn't it?

dialog_00008_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_000.content: [laughter] Can you imagine her wedding planning? She’s already made ten spreadsheets!

dialog_00008_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_000.content: [laughter] What a legend! Next thing we know, she'll have a color-coded calendar for every detail!

dialog_00008_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_000.content: I went to that art exhibit last weekend, and I was truly blown away!

dialog_00008_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_000.content: Really? I heard it had some incredible pieces! What was your favorite?

dialog_00008_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_000.content: There was this breathtaking installation with lights. It felt like walking in a dream!

dialog_00008_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_000.content: That sounds amazing! I definitely need to check it out this week.

dialog_00008_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_000.content: [laughter] Can you believe that one painting that looked like spilled paint? It's just wild!

dialog_00008_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_000.content: Right? [laughter] It’s almost like the artist was at an art party gone wrong!

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: Did you see that new art exhibit downtown? It's amazing!

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: I did! The sculptures were incredible; they had such an unusual style to them.

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: Exactly! And that painting with the bold colors really drew me in.

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: I loved that too! The artist really knew how to use color to evoke emotion.

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: I mean, can you believe it? [laughter] People waited forever to see the art there!

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: I know! [laughter] Like, it's art, but waiting that long was like a marathon!

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: I'm so excited about our housewarming party! I can't believe it's finally happening!

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: Me too! It feels like we've been waiting forever. Do you have the guest list ready?

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: Absolutely! And I was thinking we could have a BBQ in the backyard. It'll be great!

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: That sounds awesome! Plus, some good music would really set the vibe.

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: [laughter] And guess what? I just ordered a ton of snacks for our party, it's going to be epic!

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: Yay! [laughter] You know snacks make everything better! What's on the menu?

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_000.content: So, how about we have the housewarming party this weekend? It should be fun!

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_000.content: Absolutely! I can't wait to see everyone gathered here. What should we do for food?

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_000.content: I was thinking BBQ. You know how much people love that!

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_000.content: Great choice! A BBQ is always a hit. Do you think we'll need extra chairs?

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_000.content: [laughter] Anyway, what do you think about adding games to keep things lively?

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_000.content: Yes! [laughter] Games are a must! Whoever loses has to cook next time!

dialog_00002_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_001.content: I really miss the way we used to do Thanksgiving dinner with the whole family!

dialog_00002_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_001.content: Same here! It was chaotic but so much fun to have everyone gathered around the table.

dialog_00002_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_001.content: And the stories! Uncle Joe had the best tales. I still remember his fishing trip fiascos!

dialog_00002_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_001.content: Oh, those never got old! And don't forget the dessert competition between Aunt May and Aunt Liz.

dialog_00002_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_001.content: You remember the decorating from last year, right? [laughter] It was totally epic in a chaotic way!

dialog_00002_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_001.content: Exactly! [laughter] I still can’t believe we let that happen. Poor cat didn't know what hit him!

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: You know, I always look forward to our family’s holiday cookie baking days! It’s a tradition!

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: Oh, absolutely! We end up with flour everywhere, but that’s what makes it fun.

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: Right? And I can’t believe Aunt Judy still insists on making those weird fruitcake cookies.

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: I know! [chuckles] Everyone tries to be polite, but they really aren’t great.

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: [laughter] Speaking of traditions, remember last year’s epic gingerbread house baking fiasco?

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: Haha! [laughter] Oh, that looked like a tornado hit it! How did we even manage that?

dialog_00007_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_001.content: I can't wait for our mountain trip! The fresh air will do us good.

dialog_00007_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_001.content: Absolutely! I've been looking forward to getting away from the city noise.

dialog_00007_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_001.content: It's gonna be a fantastic adventure! Hiking, campfires, and snacks - all the essentials.

dialog_00007_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_001.content: And the view! Oh man, let's make the most out of it.

dialog_00007_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_001.content: Can you believe it? [laughter] I actually started packing days ago for our trip!

dialog_00007_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_001.content: [laughter] That's so you! I haven't packed a thing - I'm in trouble!

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: I’m really excited to hit the mountains this weekend! It's going to be a great escape!

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: Absolutely! Fresh air and stunning views – what could be better?

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: And we've got the perfect playlist for the drive up! I can already picture us singing along.

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: Yes! And don't forget the snacks! You know the road trip isn’t complete without them.

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: [laughter] So, what's our backup plan if it rains? I mean, we can't exactly sing in the downpour!

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: Right? [laughter] I guess we'd just pull off the roadside and dance under the umbrella!

dialog_00006_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_002.content: I can't wait for our weekend getaway! It'll be so refreshing!

dialog_00006_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_002.content: Totally! A break from work sounds amazing right now!

dialog_00006_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_002.content: I just hope we find some cool activities to do there.

dialog_00006_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_002.content: Oh, I'm sure we can. I've heard there's so much to explore!

dialog_00006_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_002.content: Can you imagine? [laughter] I packed enough clothes for a month instead of a weekend!

dialog_00006_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_002.content: [laughter] Right? We could probably start a fashion show everyday on this trip!

dialog_00008_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_000.content: I'm so excited about our weekend getaway! It's been too long since we all did something fun.

dialog_00008_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_000.content: I know, right? Just thinking about being at the beach makes me feel relaxed already.

dialog_00008_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_000.content: And the sunsets! Last time they were absolutely breathtaking.

dialog_00008_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_000.content: I can't wait to snap some pictures and make everyone jealous!

dialog_00008_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_000.content: [laughter] Can you believe we're finally putting this trip together? It feels like a dream!

dialog_00008_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_000.content: Right? [laughter] I thought this trip would never actually happen, but here we are!

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: I can't believe we're already organizing Emma's baby shower! It's going to be so special.

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: I know! And the surprise part is going to blow her away! I can't wait.

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: Right? She has no idea. I’m excited to see her face!

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: Me too! It’s going to be the best surprise ever.

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: [laughter] Did you hear she’s kind of obsessed with penguins now? What a choice!

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: I know, right? [laughter] Maybe we should get a giant penguin for the decoration!

dialog_00005_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_002.content: I can't believe we're finally planning the baby shower for Jess! It's so exciting!

dialog_00005_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_002.content: I know, right? She's going to be over the moon with the surprise!

dialog_00005_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_002.content: Exactly! We still need to finalize the guest list. Do you have any ideas?

dialog_00005_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_002.content: How about we include some of her closest friends from work and a few family members?

dialog_00005_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_002.content: Can you imagine [laughter]? If we ask her mom to help, who knows what could happen!

dialog_00005_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_002.content: Haha, totally! [laughter] Jess's mom has a flair for the dramatic, that’s for sure!

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: Did you see the photos from last week's hike? It looked amazing!

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: Yes! The scenery was incredible, especially that view from the top.

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: I know, right? All the colors and the sky! We should definitely go back.

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: Absolutely! I could use more time out in nature like that.

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: [laughter] So, I've heard about this new hiking trail that's supposed to be even better than the last one!

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: Oh really? [laughter] I’m all in! We just have to make sure to pack snacks this time!

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: I'm so excited for our hiking trip this weekend! The weather looks perfect for it.

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: Absolutely! I've heard the views from the top are breathtaking.

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: I can't wait to take some photos. It’s going to be an adventure for sure!

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: I was just thinking that we should pack a nice picnic too!

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: [laughter] Did you see that one trail map? It really looks like a rollercoaster!

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: Right? [laughter] It’ll be like hiking and riding the swings all at once!

dialog_00002_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_001.content: I'm so excited about the new holiday tradition we started this year!

dialog_00002_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_001.content: Me too! The family potluck was a huge hit, wasn't it?

dialog_00002_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_001.content: Absolutely! Everyone brought their favorite dishes, and they were all amazing.

dialog_00002_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_001.content: My uncle's pie was the star, for sure! I think I had three slices.

dialog_00002_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_001.content: Grandma was cooking, and [laughter] her moves in the kitchen? Simply unforgettable!

dialog_00002_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_001.content: Right? [laughter] I couldn’t tell if we were having dinner or a dance-off!

dialog_00007_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_002.content: We finally started that new holiday tradition of baking cookies together!

dialog_00007_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_002.content: It was so much fun! I can’t believe how chaotic it got in the kitchen!

dialog_00007_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_002.content: Right? Flour was everywhere, and we almost burned the batch!

dialog_00007_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_002.content: Definitely, but those mistakes just made it better! The memories are what count.

dialog_00007_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_002.content: Can you believe it? [laughter] The dog just couldn't resist snatching our cookies right away!

dialog_00007_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_002.content: Ha! [laughter] I guess he thought they were just for him! Smart little thief!

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: I can't wait for the holiday gathering this year! It's going to be so much fun!

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: Absolutely! Everyone will be there, including grandma's famous pie.

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: Oh wow, grandma's pie is the highlight! I hope she doesn't forget the secret ingredient this time.

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: Right? I swear, that missing ingredient could be a disaster!

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: [laughter] Can you imagine if grandma tried to use a new recipe? Disaster waiting to happen!

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: Seriously! [laughter] We’d all be laughing our heads off if that happened!

dialog_00006_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_002.content: I can't wait for the holiday gathering at Grandma's house!

dialog_00006_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_002.content: Me too! It's always such a blast with the family around.

dialog_00006_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_002.content: Not to mention all the delicious food she makes! I'm ready to feast.

dialog_00006_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_002.content: Absolutely! And those games we play afterward are the best part!

dialog_00006_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_002.content: I mean, [laughter], five cakes?! Grandma really knows how to make it special!

dialog_00006_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_002.content: Seriously! [laughter] It's like a cake battle waiting to happen!

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: So, I've been thinking about whether to take that job offer in another city.

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: It's definitely a big decision. What are your thoughts on it so far?

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: Well, I like the idea of a new adventure, but... you know, I'm also going to miss everyone here.

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: That's completely understandable. Change can be tough, especially when you have strong connections.

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: [laughter] I mean, there's a part of me that thinks I should just leap and go for it!

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: Right?! [laughter] Sometimes you just have to take a leap and see what happens!

dialog_00001_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00001_002.content: I was thinking about asking for a promotion at work, but I'm not quite sure.

dialog_00001_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00001_002.content: That sounds like a big decision. What’s holding you back?

dialog_00001_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00001_002.content: I guess I don't want to seem pushy, you know?

dialog_00001_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00001_002.content: I totally understand that. Finding the right moment can be tough.

dialog_00001_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00001_002.content: Should I just shoulder on without [laughter]? The promotion is weighing on me a lot!

dialog_00001_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_002.content: I hear you! [laughter] But just think of how great it would feel to finally get that promotion!

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: I'm so excited for our movie marathon this weekend! It's going to be epic!

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: Totally! I've been waiting all week to binge-watch those classics!

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: Right? I can't believe we’re finally doing it; we’ve talked about it for ages!

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: I know! Plus, the snacks are going to be a game changer. I might get extra popcorn!

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: [laughter] So, who's going to withstand my endless commentary during the movies?

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: Oh no! [laughter] I hope I can handle your commentary while we're munching on snacks!

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: I'm so excited for our movie marathon this weekend! We've been planning this forever!

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: I know! It's going to be epic! I can't wait to finally crush all those snacks too.

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: And the theme we've chosen? Classics versus modern films! Talk about a showdown!

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: Absolutely! It's like the ultimate face-off in movie history. Can't believe we're trying to tackle so many.

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: [laughter] I'm not sure how we'll survive all those back-to-back movies!

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: Right? [laughter] Hope our popcorn game is on point to keep us awake!

dialog_00007_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_001.content: I'm telling you, Mia just had the wildest time on her trip to Thailand. Those jungle treks sounded insane!

dialog_00007_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_001.content: Right? And she posted those photos of the street food—I'm still drooling over the mango sticky rice!

dialog_00007_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_001.content: Seriously! I think I gained five pounds just from looking at them! She's always been adventurous!

dialog_00007_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_001.content: Totally! And can we talk about how she tried surfing for the first time? That's so unlike her!

dialog_00007_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_001.content: So, [laughter] can you believe Mia actually went snorkeling? She was swimming with fish!

dialog_00007_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_001.content: I know, right? [laughter] What a turn around! Who knew she’d dive into snorkeling?

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: Did you see the photos from Sarah's trip? They look amazing!

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: I know! The landscape is breathtaking. She's having such a great time.

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: And I heard she tried scuba diving for the first time! That's so adventurous!

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: Right? I'm always amazed by how brave she is when it comes to trying new things.

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: [laughter] I can't believe she haggled her way through the markets! What a sight!

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: [laughter] I love that! She's probably scaring the shopkeepers, haha!
